entry.title: Crom, The One Who Can't Concentrate With Too Much Noise
entry.content:
Crom is a man who works early.
He definitely does not have hair that’s curly.
He likes to have interesting chats.
I highly doubt he works out the lats.

He is quite a unique one, that Crom is.
Of that I am telling the truth, I promise.
He walks about with a full bowl of food,
And does things that some might think of as rude.

He tells bad jokes
To most any of the folks.
Worst of all when it’s about work and he’s on the phone
He tells me and my friends to lower our tone.

It’s very strange since there are rooms.
I mean, you can’t make noise like you can in the restrooms.
At the least he can watch out to not be so loud,
But that lack of self-examination is what sets him apart from the crowd.
